New Records: Bangladesh lost to Pakistan by 5 wickets in the Super-12 stage of the T20 World Cup on November 6, 2022.
Shakib Al Hasan mentioned the team's score of 145-5 would have been reasonable on the Adelaide pitch.
Key Match Events: Bangladesh's loss to Pakistan ended their journey in the T20 World Cup.
Shakib Al Hasan expressed his desire to continue playing as long as he remains fit and performing.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan said this was Bangladesh's best performance in a T20 World Cup but added that they could have done better.
Bangladesh finished second from bottom in Group-2 with 4 points from 5 matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan qualified for the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup after their win against Bangladesh.
This was Bangladesh's second consecutive semi-final appearance in the tournament.
